metadata.title: CVE-2019-12466 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Wikimedia MediaWiki through 1.32.1 allows CSRF.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12466` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.2-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.2-1').
